# Chapter4: Basic command
## 4.2. Variable
```{r}
x<--2
y=5
assign("j",4)
j
```

## 4.3 Data
### 4.3.1 Numerical data

```{r}
class(x) #"numeric"
is.numeric(x) #TRUE
i<-5L #integer
is.integer(i) #TRUE
is.numeric(i) #TRUE
class(4L) #integer
class(2.8) #numeric
```

### 4.3.2 Text data
```{r}
x<-"data"
y<-factor("data")
y<-"data"
class(x) #character
nchar(x) #4 = number of character
nchar(452) #3
nchar(y) #error - y requires a character vector
```

### 4.3.3 date
```{r}
date1<-as.Date("2012-06-28")
class(date1) #date
as.numeric(date1) #15519

date2<-as.POSIXct("2012-06-28 17:42")
date2
class(date2) #[1] "POSIXct" "POSIXt" 
as.numeric(date2) #[1] 1340872920
```
